languages.text: {n}Глейто, широко расставив лапы и грозно рыча, обводит кают-компанию алыми визорами. Измазанная кровью кинетическая челюсть лязгает, рассыпая искры. Окровавленные люди в стороне наблюдают за каждым его движением с животным ужасом.{/n}

{n}Glaito, paws spread wide and growling menacingly, scans the wardroom with his scarlet visors. His blood-smeared kinetic jaw clangs, sending sparks flying. Frozen on the sidelines in animal terror, the bloody officers watch his every move.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Глейто, широко расставив лапы и грозно рыча, обводит кают-компанию алыми визорами. Измазанная кровью кинетическая челюсть лязгает, рассыпая искры. Окровавленные люди в стороне наблюдают за каждым его движением с животным ужасом.{/n}

{n}Glaito, paws spread wide and growling menacingly, scans the wardroom with his scarlet visors. His blood-smeared kinetic jaw clangs, sending sparks flying. Frozen on the sidelines in animal terror, the bloody officers watch his every move.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Glaito scannt mit ausgestreckten Pfoten und einem bedrohlichen Knurren die Offiziersmesse. Aus seinem blutverschmierten kinetischen Kiefer stieben Funken. Die blutenden Offizieren beäugen ängstlich jede seiner Bewegungen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito, paws spread wide and growling menacingly, scans the wardroom with his scarlet visors. His blood-smeared kinetic jaw clangs, sending sparks flying. Frozen on the sidelines in animal terror, the bloody officers watch his every move.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito scannt mit ausgestreckten Pfoten und einem bedrohlichen Knurren die Offiziersmesse. Aus seinem blutverschmierten kinetischen Kiefer stieben Funken. Die blutenden Offizieren beäugen ängstlich jede seiner Bewegungen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Glaito, bien campé sur ses pattes écartées, grogne d'un air menaçant en balayant le carré des officiers de ses visières écarlates. Sa mâchoire cinétique barbouillée de sang s'ouvre et se ferme dans un bruit métallique en projetant des étincelles. Non loin, cloués sur place par une terreur animale, les officiers blessés ne le quittent pas des yeux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito, paws spread wide and growling menacingly, scans the wardroom with his scarlet visors. His blood-smeared kinetic jaw clangs, sending sparks flying. Frozen on the sidelines in animal terror, the bloody officers watch his every move.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito, bien campé sur ses pattes écartées, grogne d'un air menaçant en balayant le carré des officiers de ses visières écarlates. Sa mâchoire cinétique barbouillée de sang s'ouvre et se ferme dans un bruit métallique en projetant des étincelles. Non loin, cloués sur place par une terreur animale, les officiers blessés ne le quittent pas des yeux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}グライトは前足を大きく広げ、唸り声をあげながら、赤いバイザーで士官室を鋭く見渡す。血にまみれた機械顎が金属音を立てて鳴り、火花を散らした。血まみれの士官たちは本能的な恐怖でその場に凍りついたまま、彼の一挙手一投足を見つめていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito, paws spread wide and growling menacingly, scans the wardroom with his scarlet visors. His blood-smeared kinetic jaw clangs, sending sparks flying. Frozen on the sidelines in animal terror, the bloody officers watch his every move.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}グライトは前足を大きく広げ、唸り声をあげながら、赤いバイザーで士官室を鋭く見渡す。血にまみれた機械顎が金属音を立てて鳴り、火花を散らした。血まみれの士官たちは本能的な恐怖でその場に凍りついたまま、彼の一挙手一投足を見つめていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Glaito, con las patas separadas, gruñe amenazador y rescanea la sala de oficiales con sus visores escarlatas. Su mandíbula cinética retumba, haciendo que salten chispas. Inmovilizados por el terror, los oficiales ensangrentados observan desde un lateral.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito, paws spread wide and growling menacingly, scans the wardroom with his scarlet visors. His blood-smeared kinetic jaw clangs, sending sparks flying. Frozen on the sidelines in animal terror, the bloody officers watch his every move.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito, con las patas separadas, gruñe amenazador y rescanea la sala de oficiales con sus visores escarlatas. Su mandíbula cinética retumba, haciendo que salten chispas. Inmovilizados por el terror, los oficiales ensangrentados observan desde un lateral.{/n}

languages.text: {n}格雷托伸着爪子，猩红色的面甲扫视着整个军官室，发出了充满威胁的咆哮声。它沾满鲜血的动力颚发出金属撞击的声音，火花四溅，而满身是血的军官惊恐地站在一旁，注视着它的一举一动。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito, paws spread wide and growling menacingly, scans the wardroom with his scarlet visors. His blood-smeared kinetic jaw clangs, sending sparks flying. Frozen on the sidelines in animal terror, the bloody officers watch his every move.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}格雷托伸着爪子，猩红色的面甲扫视着整个军官室，发出了充满威胁的咆哮声。它沾满鲜血的动力颚发出金属撞击的声音，火花四溅，而满身是血的军官惊恐地站在一旁，注视着它的一举一动。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Patilerini genişçe açmış, tehditkârca hırlayan Glaito; parlak kırmızı vizörleriyle subay odasını tarıyor. Kana bulanmış kinetik çenesi titrerken kıvılcım saçıyor. Bu dehşet verici manzara karşısında donakalan kan revan içindeki subaylar, hayvanın her hareketini ihtiyatla izliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito, paws spread wide and growling menacingly, scans the wardroom with his scarlet visors. His blood-smeared kinetic jaw clangs, sending sparks flying. Frozen on the sidelines in animal terror, the bloody officers watch his every move.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Patilerini genişçe açmış, tehditkârca hırlayan Glaito, parlak kırmızı vizörleriyle subay odasını tarıyor. Kana bulanmış kinetik çenesi titrerken kıvılcım saçıyor. Bu dehşet verici manzara karşısında donakalan kan revan içindeki subaylar, hayvanın her hareketini bir köşeden ihtiyatla izliyor.{/n}
